title: Rejoinder - why not see new TV show

content.description: Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices, choose the most appropriate remark that the first speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Aber die Karten f체r das Konzert sind schon lange ausverkauft.

Die Sendung f채ngt doch schon um halb neun an.

content.answer: Na ja, dann erz채hle ich dir eben morgen, wie es war.
